message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $15,000. I believe this represents a fair value given its worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the worth of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your perspective, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,750. Can we compromise at that price?
